extendedInfo.description: âââââ Best Volume Control App âââââThis simple volume control app, controls / manage the every sound your device makes.It simply acts as a volume /audio equalizer or audio manager for your android phone, With individual access to all Android audio streams, this app puts you in control of every sound your Android phone makes. Music control of your DJ, multimedia, media player will be easy.Features:- Simple UI- Move to SD Card.- Fastest sound control app.- you can adjust -Ringer volume , (Ring control)-System volume , -Notification volume , -Alarm volume , -Media (i.e. music, audio, video , songs ) , -In-call volume ( voice call ) easily.About Permissions:*INTERNET & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE :You don't have to spend money for this app, thanks to the Ad support! :)To display AdMob ads this permissions are needed.we understand your privacy so we DONT spam, its not in our DNA.Disclaimer: This is not a volume booster or audio booster app, widget.tags: volume control, volumes sound ,notification, media in-call,ringer, alarm music.

reviews.title: EXCELLENT
reviews.comment: 8/30/13 Samsung Galaxy s3  I love this app so much. It controls all volumes, it is so much easier than opening up your settings and going 3 different places. You go one place and that\'s it. So easy and I greatly thank the developers for making this app. LOVE IT.

reviews.author: Mahaveer Singh

reviews.title: Volume control +
reviews.comment: I like this app. Its easy to use with a neat and simple layout.
reviews.author: claire lewis

reviews.title: Best of the volume control apps!
reviews.comment: A couple of things I\'d like to have:  I wish that sliding the \"Notification volume\" slider didn\'t cause an Android popup that says \"Ringtone volume\" (which also happens when you slide the \"Ringer volume\" slider).  Confusing.  However, the behavior works correctly.  The two sliders do in fact control their respective volume controls just fine.  Don\'t be fooled by the display.   The others are not confusing like this specific one.  Please - let us pay for the app.  I keep getting the ad popup thing, only to have to clear the prompt that says, \"This needs an app to be opened.\"  I\'ll happily pay!  Those two things aside, this thing works GREAT!   Really.  I\'ve downloaded several of these types of apps this week, and this one is the only one that really does it the right way.  Kudos!
reviews.author: Alex Calder

reviews.title: Ehh
reviews.comment: Its alright, it\'d be nice if message alerts would be at same level as ringer instead of individually setting both. Droid RaZr
